entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Barrie
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:10 AM EST Thursday 19 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -1.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Lake Simcoe Regional Airport 3:00 PM EST Thursday 19 January 2023
Temperature: -1.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.3 kPa falling
Humidity: 83 %
Wind Chill: -9
Dewpoint: -4.0°C
Wind: ESE 33 km/h gust 52 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of drizzle mixed with freezing drizzle. Low minus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Snow or ice pellets mixed with freezing rain ending early this evening then cloudy and 60 percent chance of drizzle or freezing drizzle changing to 60 percent chance of flurries before morning. Risk of freezing drizzle before morning. Fog patches developing early this evening and dissipating before morning. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 8 this evening. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 19 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 3 in the afternoon. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle early in the morning. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h early in the afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 3 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 3 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 19 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 4. Wind chill near minus 7. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 19 January 2023
